long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This free plugin can help you easily download private videos and pictures from Telegram groups and channels. It is simple to operate and allows you to easily obtain media content.

We adhere to the principle of legal use and strongly recommend to avoid downloading unauthorized copyrighted content.

➡️ Main features:
✓ Unrestricted: Download all the content you want from any restricted group or channel.
✓ Support multiple types: Support downloading Telegram videos, pictures.
✓ No login: No account required
✓ One-click download: One-click to complete batch downloads

📝 Disclaimer:
This plugin is not directly associated with the official Telegram application/website, but is independently developed by a third party. Please use it responsibly and respect copyright.
